title: Retrieve and Summarize NCCN Climate Data
text: time use R, need load nccnclimate package log Aquarius.
code: library(nccnclimate) ## You must authenticate with Aquarius first connectToAquarius("aquarius read only username here", "aquarius read only password here")

what: Get all corrected climate time series data for a park — getParkClimateData
title: Get all corrected climate time series data for a park — getParkClimateData
text: Retrieves corrected, unsummarized time series data [PARK]_Climate folder Aquarius (e.g. OLYM_Climate).

title: Get all corrected climate time series data for a park — getParkClimateData
code: getParkClimateData(   park_code = c("MORA", "NOCA", "OLYM", "SAJH"),   parameter,   labels,   water_year,   include_derived = FALSE,   time_zone = "America/Los_Angeles" )

title: Get all corrected climate time series data for a park — getParkClimateData
text: park_code Four-letter park code(s) parameter character string indicating parameter retrieve (e.g. "Air Temp"). water_year Integer vector indicating water year(s) fetch data include_derived Include derived time series? time_zone String indicating time zone data collected . See full list TZ identifiers info.

title: Summarize NCCN Climate Data — summarizeParkClimateData
text: Summarize NCCN Climate Data

title: Summarize NCCN Climate Data — summarizeParkClimateData
code: summarizeParkClimateData(   park_code = c("MORA", "NOCA", "OLYM", "SAJH"),   parameter,   label,   water_year,   summary = c("mean", "min", "max", "sum"),   summary_period = c("day", "month"),   period_of_record = FALSE,   time_zone = "America/Los_Angeles" )

title: Summarize NCCN Climate Data — summarizeParkClimateData
text: park_code Four-letter park code(s) parameter character string indicating parameter retrieve (e.g. "Air Temp"). water_year Integer vector indicating water year(s) fetch data summary Type summary perform. Options "mean", "min", "max", "sum". summary_period Period summarize. Options "day" "month". period_of_record Summarize whole period record? TRUE, summarizes across years dataset. FALSE, summaries grouped year. time_zone String indicating time zone data collected . See full list TZ identifiers info.

title: Summarize NCCN Climate Data — summarizeParkClimateData
text: data frame column data station

title: Summarize NCCN Climate Data — summarizeParkClimateData
code: if (FALSE) { # Summarize monthly total precip at OLYM over entire period of record olym_precip <- summarizeParkClimateData("OLYM", "Precip Increm", "Rainfall", summary = "sum", summary_period = "month", period_of_record = TRUE) olym_precip_2022 <- summarizeParkClimateData("OLYM", "Precip Increm", "Rainfall", 2022, summary = "sum", summary_period = "month", period_of_record = FALSE) }
